entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Address commented out iOS Shell Tests #8729
    6.0-servicing
  • [VisualDiagnostics] RectangleAdorner is broken #8727
  • Maui DesignTools.dll is missing Embedded Image resources #8726
    6.0-sr4
  • [IOS] #6574 REGRESSION InputTransparency always cascades to Children even when CascadeInputTransparent= false #8725
  • UI Automation Name of a Windows Maui CollectionView item isn't updated after a change to its DataTemplate's Grid's bound SemanticProperties.Description #8722
  • ScrollView ignores child scale #8719
  • The ScrollTo method does not carry the element in a grouping #8718
  • FYI: 17.3 (Prev-3) Maui Installation Requires "ASP.Net & web development" #8717
  • [Shell][Android] The truth is out there...but not on top tab search handlers #8716
  • Catalyst app under Mac idiom crashes on start when using slider control #8715
  • [Shell][Win] No animal like a Xaminal #8714
  • Rework AppThemeBinding to use IApplication and/or Window.Parent #8713
    .NET 7
  • Broken styles and margins in release mode #8712
  • Problem with publishing app to Apple App Store - Asset validation failed (90171) #8701
  • Animation not working #8700
  • What is the support for Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Forms #8699
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Xaml.WPF into the Maui repo #8698
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Xaml.UWP into the Maui repo #8697
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Win2D.UWP into the Maui repo #8696
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Text.WPF into the Maui repo #8695
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #8694
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.SharpDX.* into the Maui repo #8693
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.GDI.Winforms into the Maui repo #8692
  • Move Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Blazor.* into the Maui repo #8691

Closed

  • Problem with refreshing UI, Android #8406
  • Voiceover is not reading the search result after performing search operation. #5698
    6.0-servicing
  • After selecting "Delete" and "Update", no information is getting announced by talkback. #6477
    6.0-servicing
  • "My Recipe" button looks like Disabled control but it is not. #6598
    6.0-servicing
  • Slider not working in latest Mac Catalyst #8620

PullRequests

Created

  • [VisualDiagnostics] Fix RectangleAdorner with updated math #8728
  • Exclude `global.json` from iOS Bundle Resources #8724
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Utilize explicit dimensions for star measurements in non-Fill alignments #8720
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22363.1 #8710
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8709
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8708
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8707
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8706
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8705
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8704
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.6 to 6.0.7 #8703
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Add AppThemeBinding fallbacks for theme #8690
  • Ensure Flex items have updated values from FlexLayout children before layout #8660
    area/layout 🔲
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220713175018104 to net6.0 #8721
  • Use passed in platformView for DatePIckerHandler #8687
  • [Shell] Fixes for Shell issues with iOS and Mac #8618
    area/shell 🐢, partner/macios

Updated

  • Re-enable Shell Tests #5745
    area/shell 🐢
  • Implement menu separators #8565
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, .NET 7
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix wrong RadialGradient on Border #8408
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [iOS] Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border #8464
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Update Border StrokeTickness even if StrokeShape is null #8520
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/ui-tools
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #8584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/ListView, 6.0-servicing
  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-servicing
  • Set Window Parent before initialize the child ContentPage #8653
    t/bug, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating Entry Text without taking into account MaxLength #8674
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr4
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
